title: UAE Ramadan 2026 prayer timings and full fasting schedule for the entire month is here
summary_full: UAE residents are set for a "Winter Ramadan" in 2026, with fasting expected to begin on February 19th.  Fasting hours will be a pleasant 12 hours and 45 minutes initially, gradually increasing. The article provides a detailed daily timetable for Suhoor, Iftar, and Isha prayers, aiding in planning for this sacred period.
